mapper.select: SELECT qcon_no, cate_no, acc_no, qcon_name, qcon_contents, qcon_views, qcon_bookmark, qcon_bookcnt, qcon_comment, qcon_date, qcon_passwd FROM qna_contents ORDER BY qcon_no ASC
mapper.insert:
SELECT qna_contents_seq.nextval FROM dual
INSERT INTO QNA_CONTENTS(qcon_no, cate_no, acc_no, qcon_name, qcon_contents, qcon_views, qcon_bookmark, qcon_bookcnt, qcon_date, qcon_passwd) VALUES(#{qcon_no}, #{cate_no}, #{acc_no}, #{qcon_name}, #{qcon_contents}, 0, 'N', 0, sysdate, #{qcon_passwd})

INSERT INTO QNA_IMAGE(file_no, qcon_no, file_origin_name, file_upload_name, file_thumb_name, file_size, file_date) VALUES(qna_image_seq.nextval, #{qcon_no}, #{file_origin_name}, #{file_upload_name}, #{file_thumb_name}, #{file_size}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT file_no, qcon_no, file_origin_name, file_upload_name, file_thumb_name, file_size, file_date FROM qna_image ORDER BY qcon_no DESC, file_no ASC

SELECT qcon_no, cate_no, acc_no, qcon_name, qcon_contents, qcon_views, qcon_bookmark, qcon_bookcnt, qcon_comment, qcon_date, qcon_passwd, word FROM qna_contents
WHERE cate_no=#{cate_no}
WHERE cate_no=#{cate_no} AND (UPPER(qcon_name) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(qcon_contents) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(word) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%')
ORDER BY qcon_no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna_comment(qcmt_no, acc_no, qcon_no, qcmt_contents, qcmt_date) VALUES(qna_comment_seq.nextval, #{acc_no}, #{qcon_no}, #{qcmt_contents}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT a.acc_id, qc.qcmt_no, qc.acc_no, qc.qcon_no, qc.qcmt_contents, qc.qcmt_date FROM account a, qna_comment qc WHERE (a.acc_no = qc.qcmt_no) AND qc.qcon_no=#{qc.qcon_no} ORDER BY qc.qcmt_no DESC

SELECT acc_id, qcmt_no, qcon_no, acc_no, qcmt_contents, qcmt_date, r FROM ( SELECT acc_id, qcmt_no, qcon_no, acc_no, qcmt_contents, qcmt_date, rownum as r FROM ( SELECT a.acc_id, q.qcmt_no, q.qcon_no, q.acc_no, q.qcmt_contents, q.qcmt_date FROM account a, qna_comment q WHERE (a.acc_no = q.acc_no) AND q.qcon_no=#{qcon_no} ORDER BY q.qcmt_no DESC ) ) WHERE r <= 500

SELECT acc_id, qcmt_no, qcon_no, acc_no, qcmt_contents, qcmt_date, r FROM ( SELECT acc_id, qcmt_no, qcon_no, acc_no, qcmt_contents, qcmt_date, rownum as r FROM ( SELECT a.acc_id, q.qcmt_no, q.qcon_no, q.acc_no, q.qcmt_contents, q.qcmt_date FROM account a, qna_comment q WHERE (a.acc_no = q.acc_no) AND q.qcon_no=#{qcon_no} ORDER BY q.qcmt_no ASC ) ) WHERE r <= 500
mapper.update: UPDATE qna_comment SET qcmt_contents=#{qcmt_contents} WHERE qcmt_no = #{qcmt_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna_mark(qmark_no, acc_no, qcon_no) VALUES(qna_mark_seq.nextval, #{acc_no}, #{qcon_no})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM qna_mark WHERE acc_no=#{acc_no} AND qcon_no=#{qcon_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna_recomment(qrecmt_no, qcmt_no, qcon_no, qrecmt_contents, acc_no, qrecmt_date) VALUES(qna_recomment_seq.nextval, #{qcmt_no}, #{qcon_no}, #{qrecmt_contents}, #{acc_no}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT qrecmt_no, qcmt_no, qcon_no, qrecmt_contents, acc_no, qrecmt_date FROM qna_recomment

select qc.qrecmt_no, qc.qcmt_no, qc.qcon_no, qc.qrecmt_contents, ac.acc_no, qc.qrecmt_date, ac.acc_id from qna_recomment qc, account ac where qc.acc_no = ac.acc_no AND qc.qcmt_no = #{qcmt_no} ORDER BY qrecmt_no asc

SELECT ac.acc_no, ac.acc_id, ac.acc_img, ac.acc_saved_img, ac.acc_thumb_img, acc_img_size FROM qna_contents qc INNER JOIN account ac ON qc.acc_no = ac.acc_no WHERE qc.qcon_no=#{qcon_no} ORDER BY qc.qcon_no desc
SELECT ac.acc_no, ac.acc_id FROM qna_recomment qr INNER JOIN account ac ON qr.acc_no = ac.acc_no WHERE qr.qrecmt_no = #{qrecmt_no}
SELECT ac.acc_no, ac.acc_id, ac.acc_img, ac.acc_saved_img, ac.acc_thumb_img, ac.acc_img_size FROM qna_comment qcmt INNER JOIN account ac ON qcmt.acc_no = ac.acc_no WHERE qcmt.qcmt_no = #{qcmt_no}
SELECT dalle_no, prompt, dalle_origin FROM dalle WHERE UPPER(prompt) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{prompt}) || '%'
SELECT su.summary_no, su.acc_no, su.article, su.response, su.sdate, ac.acc_id FROM summary su INNER JOIN account ac ON su.acc_no = ac.acc_no ORDER BY su.sdate ASC
SELECT su.summary_no, su.acc_no, su.article, su.response, su.sdate, ac.acc_id FROM summary su INNER JOIN account ac ON su.acc_no = ac.acc_no WHERE su.acc_no = #{acc_no} ORDER BY su.sdate ASC
SELECT da.dalle_no, da.acc_no, da.prompt, da.dalle_thumb, da.ddate, ac.acc_id FROM dalle da INNER JOIN account ac ON da.acc_no = ac.acc_no ORDER BY ddate ASC
SELECT da.dalle_no, da.acc_no, da.prompt, da.dalle_thumb, da.ddate, ac.acc_id FROM dalle da INNER JOIN account ac ON da.acc_no = ac.acc_no WHERE da.acc_no = #{acc_no} ORDER BY ddate ASC
